name: Quik Game
description:
Quiksilver is feeling oppressed by Shadow, that dog! Help Quiksilver get her standards of living back in this fast-paced and mind-dissolving ultra-short adventure! In 2018, I had just birthed a massive touchstone to my life as an aspiring game developer when I completed Startup Tophat. It felt great that I was finally there, capable as needed, but after all that, I had to chill out and make a small game. So I made this monstrosity...

Quik Game is a game about Quiksilver defeating her dog enemy Shadow, and the gameplay is that of a tactical button mash of willpower and hope. If you believe, your mashes truly will rise victorious.

In the spirit of protecting the experience from spoilers, please download and play this game before reading the backwards writing below that is a spoiler to players (and a must-have for knowing enough about the game for the people who can't play it themselves,) by scrolling down way past it and on to the downloads section.
